channel.title: Deploy Flow :: Internship Report
channel.description: Table of Contents 5.3.1. Frontend Deploy 5.3.2. Backend Deploy

item.title: Frontend Deploy
item.description: Architectural model Domain: Route 53 (DNS) + ACM (SSL Certificate). CDN: CloudFront (Global Edge Network). Storage (Primary): S3 Singapore (ap-southeast-1). Storage (Failover): S3 N. Virginia (us-east-1). Replication: Automatically copy code from Singapore -> Virginia. Security: OAC (Origin Access Control) - Private Bucket. Table of Contents Prerequisites

item.title: Backend Deploy
item.description: Architecture Model This model illustrates the core services used for high-availability, low-latency content delivery and security: Domain & SSL: Route 53 (DNS) is used for domain management, and ACM (SSL Certificate) secures the traffic. CDN: CloudFront acts as the Global Edge Network for content delivery. Storage (Primary): S3 in Singapore (ap-southeast-1) holds the main static assets.
